QuestData.Title: Dragonmaw Takedown
QuestData.Description: The Dragonmaw!$B$B<Colin spits.>$B$BMonsters, all of them. We've fought them up and down these highlands since the last war. And now they're joining forces with the Horde?$B$BIf you're going to convince us Wildhammers to unite under the Alliance banner, you'd best prove yourself against the Dragonmaw. Wade into the battle that's raging in the Thundermar ruins to the south and southwest. Kill Dragonmaw marauders and collect the insignias that their greatest warriors wear. Then we'll talk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Dragonmaw Marauders and collect 8 Dragonmaw Insignias. Named characters within the Thundermar Ruins will also carry insignias.
QuestData.RewardText: Look at that! That's quite a collection of trophies you have there.$B$BI'll spread the word. If a single Alliance $c can do this, imagine what the rest of your lot can accomplish!
